story_07_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: You’ve trained your Pokémon really well.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The bond between you and your Pokémon is
strong, and your teamwork was spectacular. You
have defeated me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I had no idea you were this strong,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Don’t get me wrong—I’ve been rooting for you.
It’s just...frustrating, getting left behind.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Don’t allow yourself to get frustrated. The skills
you displayed when you pushed my Slaking to
the limit are the real deal.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! What an awesome
battle that was to watch!
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If you keep improving at this rate, we won’t
have anything to be afraid of no matter how
many of those Team Break thugs we run into!
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Team Break? Is that what you call those weirdos
I’ve been seeing around lately?
story_07_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Yeah, we ran into them on the way here,
but they were no match for us!
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: You’d better be careful out there, Brendan.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
It seems that they’re getting stronger than
they were before.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I have a feeling something bad might happen.
Hopefully it’s just me worrying too much.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Team Break has even got Norman worried now?
That can’t be good...
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Oh, with all that unpleasant talk, I forgot to give
you your badge.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: Heh heh... This cave seems to be the place.
story_07_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Come on! It’s time to pay a little visit...
story_07_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
We can’t let them go in there!
That cave is where sync pairs go to rest!
story_07_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: All of you! Come and help me stop those thugs!
story_07_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: I can help! Let’s go, Norman!
